Our Services

Tailored search strategies designed for the complexity of the modern workforce.

Headhunting & Executive Search

Retained search for C-Suite, SVP, and Board positions. We conduct exhaustive market research to identify leaders who align with your long-term roadmap and culture.

Core Focus Areas

  • Culture-matching assessment
  • Compensation benchmarking
  • Strategic onboarding support

Talent Specialization

Deep-dive sourcing for highly technical or specialized roles where generalist agencies fail. We maintain vertical-specific networks in Tech, Finance, and Ops.

Core Focus Areas

  • Deep technical screening
  • Passive candidate engagement
  • Niche network access

Confidential Hiring

Managing high-stakes replacements or expansion plans that require absolute discretion. We handle the process externally to protect your internal morale and market positioning.

Core Focus Areas

  • Strict NDA management
  • Secure candidate vetting
  • Off-site interview coordination

Contract & Permanent Placement

Flexible solutions for both long-term growth and immediate project-based needs. We ensure quality remains consistent regardless of the engagement type.

Core Focus Areas

  • Interim leadership
  • Full-time headhunting
  • Project-based scaling

Talent Advisory & Intelligence

Data-backed insights into the talent landscape. We provide market mapping, salary reports, and competitor analysis to inform your hiring strategy.

Core Focus Areas

  • Market mapping reports
  • Salary trend analysis
  • Competitor talent audits
